name: O-baby!
description:
Cold soup of Russian origin. 
The name probably originates from kroshit', which means to crumble into small pieces.

name: Salt-yanka
description: Thick, spicy and sour soup in Russian and Ukrainian cuisines.

name: Lazy golubtsi
description: Popular among European Jews, and traditionally served on Simchat Torah. /nStuffed cabbage is described by Gil Marks to have entered Jewish cooking some 2,000 years ago.
